com.google.devtools.simple.runtime.components.android.util
Class BluetoothReflection

java.lang.Object
  com.google.devtools.simple.runtime.components.android.util.BluetoothReflection

public class BluetoothReflection
extends java.lang.Object

Provides access to Android Bluetooth classes via Java reflection.
